Description.Name: more RATs, ROOTKITS and WORMS...
Description.Details: You are leaving your office when you run into Darius, "Looking for me?" Darius nods, "Yes Commander. It seems the fix we had done on our jump records has been noticed and come under scrutiny by the CJSTA." You groan, "Damn! I was hoping we would have more time. What are they wanting now?" Darius responds, "We haven't heard from the CJSTA. Our new associates have sent a message via the datakey to let us know we are back on the CJSTA's radar apparently." You pause, thinking, "So, we can either wait for them to notify us of being in breach again, or we can have our new associates take care of things." Darius nods again, "We already tried just wiping the jump cost records. Perhaps we should look at a full record clean? Ultimately, it is your call Commander."

Description.Name: Erase marker, may cost up to ¢5,000,000
Description.Details: Hire the Hacker to reset jump costs

Description.Name: Hack CJSTA Database ¢4,975,232
Description.Details: Without hesitation you respond, "Darius, have our associates expunge the details relating to our increased jump costs." Darius nods, "Yes, Commander." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The next day, Darius returns to your office, "Commander, our associates were successful in reseting the jump costs on our file with the CJSTA back to ¢25,000 per jump." You smile, "Good, good. What was the final bill?" Darius smiles, "The fee came in at ¢4,975,232." You nod, "At least it was under budget."

Description.Name: Complete Wipe, may cost up to ¢7,500,000
Description.Details: Hire the Hackers to clean the records

Description.Name: Hack CJSTA Database ¢6,056,304
Description.Details: Without hesitation you respond, "Darius, have our associates expunge all details of any misjumps recorded while the Argo was docked to any afflected jumpship." Darius nods, "Yes, Commander." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: The next day, Darius returns to your office, "Commander, our associates were successful in removing all negative marks on our file with the CJSTA." You smile, "Good, good. What was the final bill?" Darius smiles, "The fee came in at ¢6,056,304." You nod, "At least it was under budget."

Description.Name: Decline the Offer
Description.Details: No Thanks

Description.Name: Decline Offer for now
Description.Details:
You think over the options, "Can we afford either of these options right now?"

Darius quickly checks his datapad, "Well, we can but as it is not a budgeted expense, it will set us back some."

You quickly come to a conclusion, "I think for now, we will hold off asking for thier help.  Let's wait and see if the CJSTA actually send out another notice."

Darius turns to leave, "As you wish, Commander."

Description.Name: Refuse the Offer
Description.Details: Not Going to Happen

Description.Name: Refuse Offer
Description.Details: You think all the options over, "Darius, I think it best we distance ourselves from our associates. For all we know, they are feeding us false intel to make us pay more when we do not need to. Let them know we will not be needing their services." Darius responds, "I will advise them accordingly, Commander."
